content: a cozy chunky blanket that you literally knit by hand knit one in an afternoon and get cozy tonight a perfect gift or just for you *no needles needed * see my youtube tutorial here 1 size approximately 45 inches wide by 58 inches long materials super bulky/jumbo yarn approximately 140 yds shown here yarn bee eternal bliss yarn 28 yds per skein 100% polyester weight 8 oz colorway ivory five 5 skeins used in sample shown note if you are using a different type of yarn look for one with a knit gauge 2 5 stitches x 3 5 row = 4 x 4 with us size 50 25mm knitting needles or a crochet gauge 2 single_crochet x 2 row = 4 x 4 with us size u 25 mm crochet hook scissors 1 https //youtu be/wjg1vj02e6e
